You can add a tag to the site search module with something like `<input type="hidden" name="groupId" value="12345">` where 12345 is the blog ID.

I can't seem to find where that was on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-search|the actual HubSpot documentation> so here's a shameless share to <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/add-parameters-to-your-HubSpot-site-search-input-module|my post on the subject>

I do use the watch function and this will push the theme to a separate folder than the main theme on that portal. Whenever I want to push something to the live env, I just push it to the GH repo and with GH Actions it will push to the correct theme on the live portal.
